title: Growing FIRECRACKER CHILI PEPPER Time Lapse #shorts

subtasks: Ensuring proper sunlight exposure (6-8 hours per day)
Selecting a well-drained soil with pH between 6.2 and 7.0
Planting seeds 6-8 weeks before the last expected frost
Alternately, direct sowing after frost danger passes
Transplanting seedlings when they have 2 sets of true leaves
Timing transplantation for when soil reaches 60 degrees Fahrenheit
Regular watering to maintain moist soil
